title: Google\Cloud\Talent\V4beta1\Job\ApplicationInfo
name: ApplicationInfo
description:
Application related details of a job posting.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.Job.ApplicationInfo

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.emails
params.description: Use this field to specify email address(es) to which resumes or applications can be sent. The maximum number of allowed characters for each entry is 255.

params.name: data.instruction
params.description: Use this field to provide instructions, such as "Mail your application to ...", that a candidate can follow to apply for the job. This field accepts and sanitizes HTML input, and also accepts bold, italic, ordered list, and unordered list markup tags. The maximum number of allowed characters is 3,000.

params.name: data.uris
params.description: Use this URI field to direct an applicant to a website, for example to link to an online application form. The maximum number of allowed characters for each entry is 2,000.
